name: Flying Car Driving Simulator
description:
It's a bird! it's a plane!

No, it's a car. Pretty neat, eh?

All of us have thought about it while stuck in a jam or just playing out our fantasies. Flying has the kind of ring to it like no other impossible feat by humans. The desire doesn't get satiated by jet planes or hot air balloons - it only gets more ravishing.

Here we are trying to simulate that fantasy on your device - it's not the real thing but hey - who knows one day the cars might actually fly (Oh how we all envy The Jetsons) and until then here's something for you to play and enjoy.

Give it a shot and give us a shout on what we should be doing better.

Enjoy!
